paymentMethods.title: What payment methods do you accept ?
paymentMethods.content: We accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards, PayPal, UPI, and Cash on Delivery.

trackOrder.title: How can I track my order ?
trackOrder.content: After placing your order, you will receive a confirmation email. You can track your order through the courier service's tracking page.

modifyOrCancelOrder.title: Can I cancel my order after placing it ?
modifyOrCancelOrder.content: Orders can be canceled within a certain timeframe. Please contact our customer service as soon as possible for assistance.

internationalShipping.title: Do you offer international shipping ?
internationalShipping.content: Yes, we offer international shipping to many countries. Shipping costs and delivery times vary based on the destination.

returnAndRefundPolicy.title: What is your return and refund policy ?
returnAndRefundPolicy.content: We accept returns and offer refunds within 30 days of receipt. Please refer to our Returns and Refunds Policy for more details.

contactSupport.title: How can I contact customer support ?
contactSupport.content: You can reach our customer support team via email at zprincessaffron@gmail.com, or through our contact form on the website.
